summary: This document is an email chain between FBI personnel, primarily discussing the copying of digital evidence onto a 12TB drive. The correspondence involves coordination between the NY CART Coordinator/Senior Forensic Examiner and another FBI agent regarding the status of evidence copying and logistical arrangements for evidence transfer.

persons.name: NY CART Coordinator Senior Forensic Examiner
persons.role: NY CART Coordinator and Senior Forensic Examiner
persons.context: The primary correspondent in the email chain, coordinating the copying of digital evidence onto a 12TB drive and discussing logistical arrangements for evidence handling.

persons.name: M. I.
persons.context: An FBI agent mentioned as being involved in the evidence copying process and as a point of contact for questions; the evidence is to be brought to this person.

connections.person1: NY CART Coordinator Senior Forensic Examiner
connections.description: Colleagues within the FBI coordinating on evidence handling and copying procedures.

events.title: Request for 12TB drive
events.description: NY CART Coordinator requests the return of a 12TB drive from 'Southern' to copy additional items, mentioning a personal need to travel to Denver.
personsInvolved: NY CART Coordinator Senior Forensic Examiner

events.title: Evidence copying in progress
events.description: Email indicates evidence copying is ongoing but slow; arrangements are made for notification of completion and transfer to M.I.
personsInvolved: NY CART Coordinator Senior Forensic Examiner

events.title: Copy ready for pickup
events.description: Notification that the evidence copy is finished and ready for pickup at the recipient's convenience.
personsInvolved: NY CART Coordinator Senior Forensic Examiner

keyFacts: FBI personnel are actively copying digital evidence related to the Epstein case onto a 12TB drive.
The evidence copying process is described as slow, indicating a large volume of data.
The correspondence is subject to a protective order covering specific paragraphs (7, 8, 9, 10, 15, and 17).
The NY CART Coordinator mentions a personal trip to Denver due to a family emergency (sister in hospice).
The document references evidence transfer from 'Southern,' likely referring to the Southern District of New York (SDNY).
